text: K233CY (94.5 FM, "The City 94.5") is a translator broadcasting the adult album alternative format of the HD2 subcarrier of KBVB. Licensed to Wahpeton, North Dakota, it serves the Fargo-Moorhead metropolitan area. The station is currently owned by James and Brooke Ingstad, through licensee North Dakota Free Airways. All the offices and studios are located at 2720 7th Ave S Street in Fargo, which is where the translator's transmitter is located. The station signed on as "The Loft 94.5" on October 22, 2014 only to rebrand as "The City 94.5" a week later around October 30, 2014 due to a trademark claim from SiriusXM.Loft Launches in Fargo ==References== ==Station Staff== * Kyle (Mon- Fri 6a-10a) * Jay Farley (Mon-Fri 10a-2p) * Cori Jensen (Mon-Fri 2p-6p) ==External links== *The City 94.5 * * Category:Adult album alternative radio stations in the United States BVB-HD2 Category:Radio stations established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in North Dakota
title: KBVB-HD2
